game.name: FAIRY TAIL: Beach Volleyball Havoc
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: FAIRY TAIL 캐릭터들이 한여름의 비치에서 마구 날뛴다! 화려한 마법을 쓰며 비치 발리를 부수자.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The cast of Fairy Tail is ready to bring mayhem to the summertime beaches! Unleash over-the-top magic to BLAST that volleyball!

reviewHighlights.text: Easy game to pick up and hard to put down. The game has almost every fairy tail character to unlock and getting the artwork achievement is really easy...
if u r a fairy tail fan its a must buy, worth the price 100%
